name: 蘇昭瑾
objective: 介紹氣體的物理性質，熱力學第一、第二與第三定律，化學反應之熱能變化與動力學，以及系統中的相平衡。
schedule:
1   Overview
2-3 • From Second Law to Third Law:
      --- The Third Law of thermodynamics
      --- The Helmholtz and Gibbs energies
      --- Standard molar Gibbs energies
4-6   The Origins of Quantum Mechanics 
      --- The failures of classical physics
      --- Wave–particle duality
7     • First Examination
8-9   • The Dynamics of Microscopic Systems 
      --- The Schrödinger equation
      --- The Born interpretation of the wavefunction
10-12 • Quantum Mechanical Principles 
      --- The information in a wavefunction
      --- The uncertainty principle
      --- The postulates of quantum mechanics
13    Second Examination
14    • The Rates of Chemical Reactions
      --- Experimental techniques
      --- The rates of reactions
15    --- Integrated rate laws
      --- Reactions approaching equilibrium
16    --- The temperature dependence of reaction rates
      --- Elementary reactions
17    --- Consecutive elementary reactions
      --- Unimolecular reaction
18    • Third Examination
scorePolicy:
• 三次考試 各佔 30% ，平時分數 10% 
• 點名不到一次扣學期總分5分，超過4次學期成績總分為59
materials: Physical Chemistry, Atkins’, Oxford University Press 2006, 8th ed. (歐亞)
